testCase.name: getCharacters doit retourner tous les personnages
getCharacterById doit retourner un personnage par son ID
getCharacterById doit retourner undefined pour un ID inexistant
AboutPage Component should render the About information
AboutPage Component should change the document title
CharacterDetailPage Component should render character name correctly
CharacterDetailPage Component should render CharacterDetail component with character data
ContactPage Component should render the contact information
ContactPage Component should change the document title
ContactPage Component should have a mailto link
CharactersList Component should display a list with one character
CharactersList Component should display a list with multiple characters
CharacterDetail Component should display character image when thumbnail is provided
CharacterDetail Component should display "No description available." when description is missing
CharacterDetail Component should display "No modification date available." when modified date is missing
CharacterDetail Component should display the correct description and modification date when provided
